title: Reveal Hidden Pitfalls and Navigate Next Generation of Vector Similarity Search from Task-Centric Views
summary: Vector Similarity Search (VSS) in high-dimensional spaces is rapidly emerging as core functionality in next-generation database systems for numerous data-intensive services -- from embedding lookups in large language models (LLMs), to semantic information retrieval and recommendation engines.
